message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I have to make a living. I can meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than that. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11000.
I understand you need to make a profit, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10500. Can you meet me there?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $10500, but I'm still a bit below my target. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a bit more. I can sell it to you for $11500.
I understand you're still a bit above your target, but I'm not willing to go above $10500. Can you think of a way to meet me in the middle?
